page.text: This method allows getting connection params for Telegram WebRTC connection.
page.syntax-highlight:
from ntgcalls import NTgCalls ...
app = NTgCalls()
params = app.createCall( -1001185324811, MediaDescription( AudioDescription( input_mode=InputMode.File, input="audio.pcm", sample_rate=48000, bits_per_sample=16, channel_count=2, ), ) )
